use_cases_desc: Sensemaking tasks including information sharing, clue-finding, and analysis
contribution_desc: The paper proposes a spatially-aware multi-device sensemaking system. In a lab experiment, the system is compared to a tabletop system and a paper-based method.
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking; Orientation; Identity; Distance;; Multiple screens; Location 3D
tracking_tech: Qualisys Oqus; Camera-based tracking; Optical; Marker-based IR Tracking; Static setup
